snippet: President Obama on Wednesday unveiled plans to introduce legislation by next week that includes a ban on assault weapons, limits on high-capacity magazines and other steps.
abstract: Pres Obama unveils plans to introduce gun control legislation that includes ban on assault weapons, limits on high-capacity magazines and other steps; vows to rally public opinion, in aftermath of Newtown, Conn, school shooting, to spur reluctant Congress to act; recognizing that legislative fight could be long and difficult, Obama also takes immediate steps by issuing series of executive actions intended to reduce gun violence.

byline.original: By PETER BAKER and MICHAEL D. SHEAR
byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Charlie Savage, Jennifer Steinhauer and Jonathan Weisman.

lead_paragraph: President Obama on Wednesday unveiled plans to introduce legislation by next week that includes a ban on assault weapons, limits on high-capacity magazines and other steps.

headline.seo: Obama Unveils Proposals for Toughening Laws on Guns
headline.main: Obama to ‘Put Everything I’ve Got’ Into Gun Control
